reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on part of a two leg trip to Leavenworth. This is a very nice hotel, at a fairly reasonable price. The rooms are clean and comfortable. We booked a triple room, which we rented for only $77 dollars per night, considerably less than the tripadvisor average price. It was very large, with the two queen beds and a nice sized sitting area with couches and a desk. The front lobby was decorated for Christmas already, which was a nice touch. We found absolutely no problem with the wireless internet, as a previous review stated. The pool looked nice, also, and the continental breakfast was very good. Overall, we had a very plesant stay and would stay again if we needed to stay in Omak.
reviews.title: Good value, Nice hotel

likes.liked: — the clean, comfortable rooms, good price and hospitable staff
likes.disliked: — nothing much... ideally the continental breakfast could have offered more fruit, but it is out of season so that wasn't a problem

reviews.text: I have stayed at the Omak Inn several times when I have been up there for business. The rooms are quiet and clean and the staff is nice. For internet access make sure to ask for a room in the 'New" wing. Those rooms can fill up quickly as the motel is very popular with out of town workers. Other choices of restaurants, other than next door, would include The Breadline and the mexican restaurant on the main street downtown. Not may choices for places to stay in the Omak-Okanogan area. This is clearly the best.
reviews.title: The only choice in Omak

reviews.text: The facility itself is very nice. When the front desk person I spoke with sounded very confused while placing our reservation, it prompted me to call back to confirm later in the day. There was NO wireless internet in the room. This was a big problem as I had stressed that it was mandatory as we own a computer business and must be able to access the internet to keep a check on our servers etc. Whatever you do do not spend your hard earned money at the restaurant next door that they recommend, one would be much better off with the Subway sandwich shop also right next door. In retrospect we will be staying elsewhere if we ever have to stay in Omak again.
reviews.title: No wireless!

likes.disliked: — No wirelss internet in the room we were in. The restaurant that they recommend

reviews.title: a warm caring place
reviews.text: Me and my family stayed there after my ex-wife and sons mother was killed in a car accident aug 13 of last year, and they went out of there way to make us feel welcomeand treated us like we were old friends, I would deffenetly recomend the Omak inn to anyone staying in omak.scott adams

reviews.title: The Omak Inn is a Great Place
reviews.text: We enjoy the Omak Inn as it is very clean and has all the amenities we enjoy. It is a nice place to get away for the weekend.
